description.value: As a swift action, you can grow an exoskeleton that grants you a +1 enhancement bonus to your natural armor and 1d4 temporary hit points + 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have. The natural armor bonus increases by 1 for every 5 cleric levels you have. The exoskeleton retracts after 1 round, ending its benefits. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
